lines.text: Only Fey gathered in the old way has any value.
Now you know why they put the music in that silly old cigar box.
Goodbye, Fatumak. Thank you for everything. Goodbye!
There are no goodbyes between friends.
This is the whale's tooth of remembrance until we meet again.

[waking up to see a gun being pointed at him]
Why am I being killed?
I'm an old sea hand, O'Keefe. I've taken women aboard ships myself.
You're wrong, Harris. I want to marry her.
If that's what you think, you better pull the trigger!
And I'll make her a good husband!

[lowers his gun]
Be good to her.
Where did I go wrong, old man?
We all lose our way sometimes.
The whale that swallows the dolphin chokes and dies, but the whale who lives without greed is the king of the sea.
